xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/413064-Awesome Mausam 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iUDZdjffGyG4zvhQz1MZeHBrLzr.jpg This love story between a Hindu boy, Rahul Sharma (Rahul Romy Sharma) and Muslim girl, Ghazal Siddiqui (Ambalika Sarkar) invokes the ‘Laila-Majnu’ track to drive home it’s legendary leanings. Unfortunately there’s really nothing much to recommend here save for a few lines of stinging thought-provoking dialogue. Awesome Mausam
